name: Doppelgängers
description:
Made in 48 hours, for Weekly Game Jam #158 "Replay".

Pick up food to replenish energy but beware: when you do so, a copy of yourself will spawn, it wil chase you and try to kill you.
Use the bombs to kill your copies.

Controls:

  • WASD or arrow keys to move
  • Space to dash

Music and sfx are from https://freesound.org.
